channel.title: 525 Animations Help
channel.description:
Just added SWAT's 525 animations for 317 renamed client. Lets me log in and perform the animations with no hassel. Although when i travel throughtout my client i get this error:
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65535 at client.method101(client.java:8025) at client.method96(client.java:7794) at client.method95(client.java:7760) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3114) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2266) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] It seems to happen alot when i go near spawned npcs so i cleared my spawn-config, the error stopped.
What should I do?

item.title: 525 Animations Help
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Pblord7:

either get a 525 or keep it a 317, kthx

That doesnt help whatsoever. I am asking for an explanation of the error and how to fix. I do not want to move up to a 525 because I could have just done that in the first place… kthx

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Animations Help
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Just added SWAT’s 525 animations for 317 renamed client. Lets me log in and perform the animations with no hassel. Although when i travel throughtout my client i get this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65535
        at client.method101(client.java:8025)
        at client.method96(client.java:7794)
        at client.method95(client.java:7760)
        at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3114)
        at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2266)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101)
        at client.run(client.java:4689)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

It seems to happen alot when i go near spawned npcs so i cleared my spawn-config, the error stopped.

What should I do?

Read full topic
